ingredients.ingredient: 3 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, divided, or to taste
2 tablespoons minced garlic, or more to taste
1 ½ teaspoons chopped fresh rosemary, or to taste
1 ½ teaspoons chopped fresh basil, or to taste
1 ½ teaspoons chopped fresh thyme, or to taste
1 ½ teaspoons chopped fresh parsley, or to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste

cookingTips: Dimple the dough with your fingertips before topping for classic focaccia texture
Let dough rest 15 minutes before adding toppings to prevent deflation
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How would you enhance this focaccia with different herb combinations or toppings?
